code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import session from'./session';import restaurants from'./restaurants';import reservations from'./reservations';import reviews from'./reviews';import savedRestaurants from'./savedRestaurants';const rootReducer=combineReducers({session,restaurants,reservations,reviews,savedRestaurants});let enhancer;if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'){enhancer=applyMiddleware(thunk);}else{const logger=require('redux-logger').default;const composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));}const configureStore=preloadedState=>{return createStore(rootReducer,preloadedState,enhancer);};export default configureStore;
